[
    Expression {
        expr: Infix {
            lhs: Variable(
                Variable {
                    start: (
                        3,
                        1,
                    ),
                    name: "e",
                    end: (
                        3,
                        4,
                    ),
                },
            ),
            op: Assign,
            rhs: New {
                target: AnonymousClass {
                    attributes: [],
                    extends: None,
                    implements: [],
                    body: [
                        Method(
                            Method {
                                start: (
                                    4,
                                    5,
                                ),
                                end: (
                                    6,
                                    5,
                                ),
                                name: Identifier {
                                    start: (
                                        4,
                                        21,
                                    ),
                                    name: "bar",
                                    end: (
                                        4,
                                        24,
                                    ),
                                },
                                attributes: [],
                                parameters: MethodParameterList {
                                    start: (
                                        4,
                                        24,
                                    ),
                                    end: (
                                        4,
                                        26,
                                    ),
                                    members: [],
                                },
                                body: Some(
                                    [
                                        Expression {
                                            expr: Call {
                                                target: Identifier(
                                                    Identifier {
                                                        start: (
                                                            5,
                                                            9,
                                                        ),
                                                        name: "exit",
                                                        end: (
                                                            5,
                                                            13,
                                                        ),
                                                    },
                                                ),
                                                args: [
                                                    Arg {
                                                        name: None,
                                                        value: LiteralInteger {
                                                            i: "1",
                                                        },
                                                        unpack: false,
                                                    },
                                                ],
                                            },
                                        },
                                    ],
                                ),
                                modifiers: MethodModifierGroup {
                                    modifiers: [
                                        Public {
                                            start: (
                                                4,
                                                5,
                                            ),
                                            end: (
                                                4,
                                                12,
                                            ),
                                        },
                                    ],
                                },
                                return_type: Some(
                                    ParentReference,
                                ),
                                by_ref: false,
                            },
                        ),
                    ],
                },
                args: [],
            },
        },
    },
]
